page.title: 07Local Events in Saline Fife
page.content: The events which take place in Saline annually include the Saline and District Horticulture and Industrial Amateur Society's Show. It is held at the beginning of September and a variety of cups and The Society Shield are competed for. The Community Council are this year taking responsibility for the running of the Children's Gala. Side shows and stalls are erected in Saline Public Park with local clubs and groups taking responsibility for the stalls. The Fire Brigade and Army Training Corps are invited to give displays and local dancing classes demonstrate their skills. This year's event will include races for Saline children of primary school age.
